author: bitcoinbay
title: Cardano Hub West Africa
description: There is a limited Cardano community in west Africa. People lack awareness of Cardano as an option;  as well as the business opportunities.
solution: Fund A Cardano Hub in West Africa. will host regional events and provide educational workshops, delivered by local community members.
experience:
Hosting Bitcoin meetups and workshops since 2013
Hosting Multiple crypto meetups globally.
Hosting Cardano meetups in Toronto.
